case_name_full: Catherine Jones v. State of Florida
attorneys:
No appearance for appellant.

 J. Tom Watson,  Attorney General, and  John C. Wynn,  Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.
posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Sumter County, J.C.B. Koonce, Judge.
headmatter:
CATHERINE JONES v. STATE OF FLORIDA
21 So. (2nd) 41

January Term, 1945


February 27, 1945 Division A
No appearance for appellant.
J. Tom Watson, Attorney General, and John C. Wynn, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

opinions.opinion_text:
This appeal is from a judgment of conviction of second degree murder.
No brief has been filed for appellant and the Attorney General has moved the Court to affirm the judgment on the record.
We find no error in the record and the motion is granted and the judgment is affirmed.
CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur. *Page 589
